original_text: Their enemies have attacked them like lions. They have destroyed my people's land. They have destroyed your cities with fire. Nobody lives in them any more. Their enemies have attacked them like lions. They have destroyed my people's land. They have destroyed your cities with fire. Nobody lives in them any more. Their enemies have attacked them like lions. They have destroyed my people's land. They have destroyed your cities with fire. Nobody lives in them any more. Their enemies have attacked them like lions.
korean_text: 어린 사자들이 그를 향하여 부르짖으며 소리를 질러 그의 땅을 황폐하게 하였으며 그의 성읍들은 불타서 주민이 없게 되었으며

sentences.original_text: Their enemies have attacked them like lions
They have destroyed my people's land
They have destroyed your cities with fire
Nobody lives in them any more
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 그곳에 사는 사람이 없습니다
